T02TD1558E:214a-0: @214a * // rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so//
T02TD1558E:214a-2: # // rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1558E:214a-3: bla ma rje btsun mnga' bdag ri khrod pa'i //
T02TD1558E:214a-4: zhabs kyi rdul la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1558E:214a-5: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yi mchod pa yi //
T02TD1558E:214a-6: thabs ni bla ma'i gsung bzhin dran nas bris //
T02TD1558E:214a-7: rnal 'byor ba yis dang por ni //
T02TD1558E:214a-8: gru bzhi la sogs dkyil 'khor bya //
T02TD1558E:214a-9: me tog lha yi grangs bzhin dgod //
T02TD1558E:214a-10: mchod sogs gtor ma ji bzhin byas //
T02TD1558E:214a-11: bdag nyid 'dod pa'i lha yi ni //
T02TD1558E:214a-12: skad cig nga rgyal gnas pa la //
T02TD1558E:214a-13: lag pa g-yon pas reg byas pas //
T02TD1558E:214a-14: dpa' bo drug gi go cha dang//
T02TD1558E:214b-0: @214b dpa' mo'i cho ga de bzhin bya //
T02TD1558E:214b-1: aom ha ni snying gar ro //
T02TD1558E:214b-2: na ma hi ni mgo bo la'o //
T02TD1558E:214b-3: sv'a h'a hu ni spyi gtsug tu'o //
T02TD1558E:214b-4: booshat he ni phrag pa gnyis la'o //
T02TD1558E:214b-5: h'um h'um ho ni mig dag la'o //
T02TD1558E:214b-6: mtshon char phat phat ham ni yan lag thams cad la'o //
T02TD1558E:214b-7: aom bam ni lte bar ro //
T02TD1558E:214b-8: ham yom ni snying gar ro //
T02TD1558E:214b-11: h'um h'um ni spyi gtsug tu'o //
T02TD1558E:214b-12: mtshon char phat phat ni yan lag thams cad la'o //
T02TD1558E:214b-13: de ltar go chag gnyis bgos nas //
T02TD1558E:214b-14: dang po sbyar bar bya ba ni //
T02TD1558E:214b-15: yam las rlung dang ram las me //
T02TD1558E:214b-16: de steng aa las mgo gsum dang //
T02TD1558E:214b-17: de yi steng du ka p'a la //
T02TD1558E:214b-19: de dag yongs su gyur pa las //
T02TD1558E:214b-20: bshad la sogs pa bdung rtsi lnga //
T02TD1558E:214b-21: de steng yi ge lnga nyid las //
T02TD1558E:214b-22: go ku la sogs rnam lngar 'gyur //
T02TD1558E:214b-23: aom gyi yi ges sbyang bar bya //
T02TD1558E:214b-24: a'a: yi yi ges rtogs par bya //
T02TD1558E:214b-25: h'um gi yi ges rab tu 'bar //
T02TD1558E:214b-26: ho yi yi ges bdud rtsir 'gyur //
T02TD1558E:214b-27: g-yon pa'i lag pas sbyang bar bya //
T02TD1558E:214b-28: g-yas pa'i lag pas rtogs par bya //
T02TD1558E:214b-29: thal mo bkab pas 'bar bar byed //
T02TD1558E:214b-30: bya khyad phyag rgyas bdud rtsir bsgyur //
T02TD1558E:214b-31: zla ba zhu ba'i rang bzhin te //
T02TD1558E:214b-32: de nas g-yon pa'i ming med kyi //
T02TD1558E:214b-33: rang gi thigs pa blangs nas su //
T02TD1558E:214b-34: sa la chos 'byung gru gsum bya //
T02TD1558E:214b-35: de yi dbus su zlum po ni //
T02TD1558E:214b-36: thig le yi ni gzugs su bya //
T02TD1558E:214b-38: de nas thig le mchod par bya //
T02TD1558E:214b-39: rang gi mgrin par myang bar bya //
T02TD1558E:214b-41: thabs dang shes rab tshim par byed pa'i cho ga ste thun mong ba'o //
T02TD1558E:214b-42: g-yon pa'i lag pa'i mthil la ni //
T02TD1558E:214b-44: dbus su aom bam rdo rje phag //
T02TD1558E:214b-45: gshin rje yum mtshams 'dab ma la //
T02TD1558E:214b-46: ham yo dag ni ya mi ni //
T02TD1558E:214b-47: hrim mom dag ni rmongs byed ma //
T02TD1558E:214b-48: hrem hrim dag ni skyed byed ma //
T02TD1558E:214b-49: phat phat dag ni tsanti ka'o //
T02TD1558E:214b-50: rgan po la ni rdo rje sems //
T02TD1558E:214b-51: mdzub mo la ni rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1558E:214b-52: padma gar dbang gung mo la //
T02TD1558E:214b-53: he ru ka dpal mid med la'o //
T02TD1558E:214b-54: rdo rje nyi ma mthe'u chung la'o //
T02TD1558E:214b-55: rta mchog rdo rje sen phreng la'o //
T02TD1558E:214b-56: de ltar yid kyi bsgom pa ni //
T02TD1558E:214b-57: sngags kyi yi ge'i gzugs nyid dam //
T02TD1558E:214b-58: yang na kha dog dbyibs kyi gzugs //
T02TD1558E:214b-59: rang gi ming brjod me tog bcas //
T02TD1558E:214b-60: de dag gis ni dgod par bya //
T02TD1558E:215a-2: chang gis kyang ni tshim par bya //
T02TD1558E:215a-3: de nas mandala steng du blugs //
T02TD1558E:215a-4: slar yang rang gi mgo la gzhag / phyi nang 'khor lo sdom pa mchod //
T02TD1558E:215a-6: yang na bcu gsum bdag nyid sogs //
T02TD1558E:215a-7: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las dam tshig 'khor lo spro bar bya //
T02TD1558E:215a-8: ye shes 'khor lo de nas gzhug / me tog la sogs re re yang //
T02TD1558E:215a-9: snying po sngags sam nye snying gis //
T02TD1558E:215a-10: rdo rje phag mo mchod par bya //
T02TD1558E:215a-11: mkha' 'gro la sogs lha mo rnams //
T02TD1558E:215a-12: rang gi ming brjod sngags la ni //
T02TD1558E:215a-13: aom ni thog mar h'um h'um mthar //
T02TD1558E:215a-14: sbyar ba yis na ni mchod par bya //
T02TD1558E:215a-15: phyogs rnams dag ni g-yon skor te //
T02TD1558E:215a-16: mtshams rnams dag ni g-yas skor du'o //
T02TD1558E:215a-17: rkang pa brgyad pa'i bstod pas mchod //
T02TD1558E:215a-18: de ltar mchod pa rdzogs pa dang //
T02TD1558E:215a-19: snod gzhan dag ni byin brlabs la //
T02TD1558E:215a-20: snod gnyis gcig tu bsre bar bya //
T02TD1558E:215a-21: ts'a ru'i bza' ba de la bshad /
T02TD1558E:215a-22: de nas gtor ma byin brlabs la //
T02TD1558E:215a-23: dang po sngags kyis snyan gsan dbab //
T02TD1558E:215a-24: kha kha la sogs sngags kyis ni //
T02TD1558E:215a-25: gtor ma rjes su dbul bar bya //
T02TD1558E:215a-26: de nas rnal 'byor tshul ji bzhin //
T02TD1558E:215a-27: 'dod pa'i longs spyod rnams la gnas //
T02TD1558E:215a-28: glu dang gar sogs thams cad bya //
T02TD1558E:215a-30: / sngags kyi mthar ni gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1558E:215a-31: lhag ma rnams ni sngon bzhin du //
T02TD1558E:215a-32: gtor ma byin gyis brlab par bya //
T02TD1558E:215a-33: zos shing 'thungs pa'i lhag ma rnams //
T02TD1558E:215a-34: sor mo lnga las bdud rtsi'i rgyun //
T02TD1558E:215a-35: bab par bsams nas yi dags kyi //
T02TD1558E:215a-36: tshogs dag la ni sbyin par bya //
T02TD1558E:215a-37: de dag ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang thun mong pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1558E:215a-38: tshes bcu la sogs dus dag tu //
T02TD1558E:215a-39: gzhan yang bla ma'i gdams dus su //
T02TD1558E:215a-40: gong bzhi mandala byas pa la //
T02TD1558E:215a-41: rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan ma ni //
T02TD1558E:215a-42: g-yung drung 'khyil pa bri bar bya //
T02TD1558E:215a-43: mtshams kyi char ni thig le bya //
T02TD1558E:215a-44: de yi dbus su mchod bya ba //
T02TD1558E:215a-45: slar yang de bzhin dri med phyir //
T02TD1558E:215a-46: snod du mdzes ma legs par btsags //
T02TD1558E:215a-48: gsang sngags ma smang ba zhes 'di //
T02TD1558E:215a-49: cho ga bzhin du dben par bri //
T02TD1558E:215a-50: 'khor lo'i mtshams su phag mo sogs //
T02TD1558E:215b-0: go cha'i lha mo mtshan ma drug / g-yung drung 'khyil pa'i mtshan @215b ma bri //
T02TD1558E:215b-1: me tog dri zhim phreng bas bskor //
T02TD1558E:215b-2: 'bras bu bzhi dang khur sna bzhi dang dang //
T02TD1558E:215b-3: khyad par can gyi mchod pa dri zhim me tog dang //
T02TD1558E:215b-4: mchod pa rnam pa du mas 'khor lo legs par mchod //
T02TD1558E:215b-5: grong khyer 'jig par gyur pa 'di ni mchog yin no //
T02TD1558E:215b-6: 'dir ni lha mo'i snying po dang /
T02TD1558E:215b-7: nye ba'i snying po'i sngags ni rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas la brtson pa na /
T02TD1558E:215b-8: 'gro ba'i don byed pa la dka' ba yod pa ma yin te /
T02TD1558E:215b-9: chos don 'dod pa thams cad 'grub 'gyur te /
T02TD1558E:215b-10: de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1558E:215b-11: rnal 'byor ba yis rtag tu ni //
T02TD1558E:215b-12: gal te yi dam du byed na //
T02TD1558E:215b-13: des na snga dro'i dus dag tu //
T02TD1558E:215b-14: cho ga bzhin du dkyil 'khor bya //
T02TD1558E:215b-15: rang 'dod lta yi grangs bzhin du //
T02TD1558E:215b-16: me tog dag ni dgram par bya //
T02TD1558E:215b-17: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las //
T02TD1558E:215b-18: spros pa'i dam tshig sems dpa' gzhag / ye shes sems dpa' de la gzhug / de nas me tog la sogs pa //
T02TD1558E:215b-19: snying po sngags dang nye snying po //
T02TD1558E:215b-20: rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis mchod //
T02TD1558E:215b-21: mkha' 'gro ma sogs thams cad ni //
T02TD1558E:215b-22: rang gi ming brjod sngags la ni //
T02TD1558E:215b-23: thog mar aom dang h'um h'um phat //
T02TD1558E:215b-24: mthar sbyar ba yi sngags kyis mchod //
T02TD1558E:215b-25: de lta'i tshul du rgyas par byas //
T02TD1558E:215b-26: phyag rgya che la mchog gzhol zhing //
T02TD1558E:215b-27: de lta'i lam la zhugs pa dag /'og ma'i lam du mi 'gro zhes //
T02TD1558E:215b-28: bdag gi bla mas de skad gsungs //
T02TD1558E:215b-29: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i mchod pa la sogs pa mdor bsdus pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1558E:215b-31: // / rgya gar mkhan po badzra p'a na'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD1558E:215b-32: lo ts'a ba mtshur gyis bsgyur ba'o//
